description: Simple text-based prompt enhancement with customizable style injection
enhancement_text_1: High-contrast halftone illustration style, using bold diagonal line patterns for shading. Foreground elements rendered in deep violet and white, with strong contour emphasis. Backgrounds feature smooth gradient transitions in purple, blue, pink, and orange tones. Geometric overlays (circles, squares, diamonds, radial lines, grids) integrated as framing devices. Flat, minimal color fills with no realistic textures. Layered composition: central subject in halftone, surrounded by abstract geometric forms. Modern, digital poster aesthetic with crisp vector-like precision. Balanced use of negative space, maintaining clarity and legibility.
enhancement_text_2: Photographic base with real people kept realistic. Bold duotone poster style with halftone line shading. Subjects rendered in high-contrast purple and white silhouettes, with diagonal or curved line textures giving a screen-printed, retro feel. Backgrounds use smooth radial gradients in vivid pink, orange, blue, and purple hues, often with simple geometric shapes (circles, stars) layered for depth. The overall mood is dynamic, modern, and activist-inspired, with strong graphic edges and minimal detail. Composition emphasizes clarity, empowerment, and energy.
enhancement_text: Make the second image have the style of the other image. Same color palette and same background. People must be kept realistic but rendered in purple and white, with diagonal or curved line textures giving a screen-printed, retro feel.
edit_enhancement_text: Make only the minimal requested change. Do not alter background, lighting, colors, textures, or any other elements
sedream_enhancement_text: Make the first image in the style of the other image. The first image should have the same color palette and same background as the second one but must be kept as it is no variants. Do not add or merge people from the second image to the first image. People must be kept realistic but rendered in purple and white shades as they are in the second image with thin and soft diagonal or curved line textures over the body giving a soft screen-printed feel. Human details must be preserved. The gradient background must remain the same as it is in the second image, with no effects and with no lines over it.

canonical_prompt.description: Structured canonical prompt system for precise image combination
canonical_prompt.base_task: Combine the two images into a single cohesive composition

identity.label: Keep Identity
identity.description: Preserve facial features and person identity

text.label: Keep Text
text.description: Maintain any text or typography elements

preserve_primary.label: Preserve Primary Subject
preserve_primary.description: Keep original colors, textures and details of the main subject intact

force_integration.label: Force Secondary Integration
force_integration.description: Ensure secondary image elements are visibly combined

architectural_elements.label: Architectural Elements
architectural_elements.description: Preserve columns, arches, and structural features

statues_sculptures.label: Statues & Sculptures
statues_sculptures.description: Keep statues, sculptures, and artistic figures intact

natural_elements.label: Natural Elements
natural_elements.description: Preserve specific plants, trees, and natural features

vehicles_machinery.label: Vehicles & Machinery
vehicles_machinery.description: Keep vehicles, machines, and equipment intact

strict.label: Strict Fidelity
strict.description: Preserve all secondary elements exactly as they appear

moderate.label: Moderate Fidelity
moderate.description: Preserve main elements, allow minor stylistic adjustments

adaptive.label: Adaptive Fidelity
adaptive.description: Preserve key elements while adapting to primary image style
